thread.section_title: Kensington West Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location!
thread.title_full: Location, location, location! - Review of Kensington West Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Coleen G
title: Location, location, location!
text:
We've just arrived home after staying here this weekend.
We were attending the Walker Stalker convention at Olympia and the location of this hotel for us was great. Less than a 5 minute walk away from the convention and in a nice residential area.
Handy for food and local shops and easy to find.
Check in was quick and hassle free.
We were in room 12 which is on the ground floor at the front. It was a decent size for both of us and was clean. I think the whole place could do with some modernisation but on the whole no problems at all.
Will look to use again if we return next year!
